column2: "Afei Kora a n'egya nye Izhar a ɔyɛ Kohat a n'egya nye Levi ne babanyin no na Eliab ne mbabanyin Datan na Abiram na Pelet ne babanyin on (Eliab na Pelet yɛ Reuben ne mbabanyin)"
"na wɔsoɛree tsiaa Moses. Wɔnye Israelmba no mu bi
column3: mboanofo no mu mbapɔmba ahaenu eduonum a wɔfrɛ hɔn bagua mu
column4: nyimpa a wɔwɔ dzin:"

column2: "na wɔpoon hɔnho hyiae bɔɔ Moses nye Aaron do ngua
column3: na wɔsee hɔn dɛ
column4: Hom yɛ dodow
column5: na mboanofo nyinara yɛ krɔnkrɔn
column7: na EWURADZE wɔ hɔn mu: ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi mbɔ na hom mema hom ho do wɔ EWURADZE ne baguaa do?"

column2: "Na Moses tsee no
column3: ɔdze n'enyim butuuw famu:"

column2: "na ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ Kora nye no kuw no nyinara dɛ
column3: Anapa EWURADZE bɛkyerɛ hɔn a wɔyɛ nedze
column4: nye nyia ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn
column5: na ɔbɛma ɔaba ne nkyɛn: mekyerɛ nyia ɔbɛsan mu eyi no no nna ɔbɛma ɔaba ne nkyɛn."

column2: "Iyi na hom nyɛ; hom mfa nduhuam asɛn
column3: Kora nye no kuw nyinara;"

column2: "na wɔmfa ogya ngu mu
column3: na wɔmfa eduhuam ngu do wɔ EWURADZE enyim ɔkyena: na ɔbɛba dɛ nyimpa a EWURADZE bɛfa no no
column4: ɔbɛyɛ krɔnkrɔn: hom yɛ dodow
column5: hom Levi mbabanyin."

column2: "Na Moses see Kora dɛ
column3: Afei hom ntsie
column4: hom Levi mbabanyin:"

column2: "ana ɔyɛ hom adze ketseaba
column3: dɛ Israel Nyankopɔn no atsew hom efi Israel mboanofo mu dɛ ɔdze hom rebɛn noho; ma hom aayɛ EWURADZE ntamadan no ho edwuma
column4: na hom egyina mboanofo no enyim asom hɔn;"

column2: "Na ɔdze nuanom
column3: Levi ne mbabanyin no nyinara ho abɛn
column4: na hom rohwehwɛ asɔfodzi so yi?"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na ɔwo nye wo kuw nyinara ehyia wɔ EWURADZE do: na Aaron dze
column3: woana nye no na hom hwinhwin tsia no?"

column2: "Na Moses somae ma wɔkɛfrɛɛ Datan nye Abiram
column3: Eliab ne mbabanyin no: na wɔsee dɛ
column4: Yɛremmba:"

column2: "ana ɔyɛ adze ketseaba dɛ eyi hɛn efi asaase a numfonsu nye ewo pem wɔ do do
column3: ruboku hɛn wɔ sar do
column4: na kyenkyennkyen iridzi hɛn do ahenmbasɛm so yi?"

column2: "Nkyii so emmfaa hɛn mmbaa asaase a numfonsu nye ewo pem wɔ do no do
column3: na emmfaa haban nye wenyin nture enyadze no so mmaa hɛn; ana mbanyin yi enyiwa na irubotutu? Yɛremmba."

column2: "Na Moses no bo fuuw kɛsenara
column3: na ɔsee EWURADZE dɛ
column4: Mma w'enyi nnsɔ hɔn afɔrbɔ: menngyee hɔn nsamu asoaso kor
column5: nkyii so mennyɛɛ hɔn mu kor biara bɔn."

column2: "Na Moses see Kora dɛ
column3: Ɔwo nye wo mboanofo no nyinara mbra EWURADZE enyim
column4: ɔwo
column5: nye hɔn

column2: "na hom mu nyimpa biara mfa n'eduhuamsɛn
column3: na hom mfa eduhuam ngugu mu
column4: na hom mu nyimpa biara mfa n'eduhuamsɛn mbra EWURADZE enyim
column5: nduhuamsɛn ahaenu eduonum; ɔwo so

column2: "Na wɔfefae
column3: nyimpa biara nye n'eduhuamsɛn
column4: na wɔdze ogya guguu mu
column5: na wɔnye Moses nye Aaron kegyinagyinaa ehyiadzibuw no n'abowano."

column2: "Na Kora poon mboanofo no nyinara hyiae bɔɔ hɔn do ngua wɔ ehyiadzibuw no n'abowano: na EWURADZE enyimnyam yii noho edzi kyerɛɛ mboanofo no nyinara."
"Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses nye Aaron dɛ
column4: "Hom ntsew homho mfi mboanofo yi mu
column5: ma menhyew hɔn amon mu."

column2: "Na wɔdze hɔn enyim butubutuuw famu
column3: na wɔsee dɛ
column4: Ao Nyankopɔn
column5: honam nyinara hɔn esunsum Nyankopɔn
column7: na wo bo efuw mboanofo no nyinara?"

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column4: "Kasa kyerɛ mboanofo no dɛ
column5: Hom ntwe hom ho do mfi Kora

column2: "Na Moses soɛree na ɔkɔr Datan nye Abiram nkyɛn; na Israel mpanyimfo no dzii n'ekyir kɔree."
"Na ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ ɔman no dɛ
column3: Mepa hom kyɛw
column4: hom ntwe hom ho mfi nyimpa bɔn yi hɔn asesee ho
column5: na mma hom nnka hɔn biribiara
column6: bɛyɛ na hom ahyew wɔ hɔn bɔn nyinara mu."

column2: "Nna wɔtwee hɔnho fii Kora
column3: Datan
column4: nye Abiram ntamadan ho wɔ afa nyina: na Datan nye Abiram fiir edzi
column5: na wobegyinagyinaa hɔn asesee abowano

column2: "Na Moses see dɛ
column3: Iyi na hom dze bohu dɛ EWURADZE na ɔasoma me dɛ mindzi dwuma yi nyinara; na mommbɔɔ mankasa me tsir mu yɛ."

column2: "Sɛ nyimpa nyinara wu ara na iyinom bowuwu
column3: anaa sɛ dza ɔto nyimpa nyinara na ɔbɔtɔ hɔn a
column4: ɔnodze na nnyɛ EWURADZE na ɔasoma me."

column2: "Na sɛ adze fofor bi dze na EWURADZE bɛyɛ
column3: na asaase bobue n'ano
column4: na ɔamen hɔn
column5: nye dza odzi wɔ hɔn nyinara
column6: na wɔnam enyikan akɔ samanadze a; ɔnodze hom ntse ase dɛ mbanyin yi ebu EWURADZE enyimtsia."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ owiee nsɛm yi nyinara ka no
column3: asaase a ɔwɔ hɔn ase no paae:"

column2: "na asaase buee n'ano
column3: na ɔmeen hɔn
column4: nye hɔn efifo
column5: nye nyimpa a wodzi wɔ Kora nyinara

column2: "Nna hɔn
column3: nye dza odzi wɔ hɔn nyinara
column4: nam enyikan sianee kɔr samanadze: na asaase no seraam hɔn do
column5: na wɔherae wɔ bagua no mu."

column2: "Na Israelfo a woetwa hɔnho ehyia no nyinara guanee wɔ hɔn nkekamu no ntsi: na wɔsee dɛ
column3: Bɛyɛ na asaase amen hɛn."

column2: "Na ogya fii EWURADZE hɔ bae
column3: na ɔbɛhyeew mbanyin ahaenu eduonum a wɔdze eduhuam bae no."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column4: "Kasa kyerɛ ɔsɔfo Aaron ne babanyin Eleazar dɛ
column5: ɔntase nduhuam asɛn no mfi ogyahyewee no mu
column6: na fa ogya no petsepetse enyim noho; na ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn:"

column2: "mekyerɛ ndzebɔnyɛfo yi a wɔayɛ hɔnankasa hɔn nkwa ho bɔn nduhuam asɛn no
column3: na ma wɔnyɛ no ɔborntɛrba mfa nyɛ afɔrmbukyia no ho nkataho: osiandɛ wɔdze baa EWURADZE enyim
column4: dɛm ntsi ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn: na ɔnyɛ asɛnkyerɛdze mma Israelmba."

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo Eleazar faa boran nduhuam asɛn no a hɔn a wɔhyewee no dze bae no; na wɔboree dze yɛɛ afɔrmbukyia no ho nkataho:"
"dɛ ɔnyɛ nkaadze mma Israelmba
column3: amma ɔhɔho bi a ommfi Aaron n'asefo mu aammba ho ammbɛhyew eduhuam wɔ EWURADZE enyim; mma ɔaannyɛ dɛ Kora
column4: nye no kuw no: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE nam Moses do kaa kyerɛɛ no no."

column2: "Na n'adzekyee no Israelmba mboanofo no nyinara hwinhwinii tsiaa Moses nye Aaron dɛ
column3: Hom na hom eku EWURADZE ne man."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a mboanofo no boaboaa hɔn ano tsiaa Moses nye Aaron no
column4: wɔdandaan hɔn enyi wɔ ehyiadzibuw no do: na
column5: hwɛ
column7: na EWURADZE enyimnyam no yii noho edzi."

column2: "Na Moses nye Aaron baa ehyiadzibuw no enyim."
"Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column4: "Hom mma hom ho do mfi mboanofo yi mu
column5: ma menhyew hɔn amon mu. Na wɔdze hɔn enyim butubutuuw famu."

column2: "Na Moses see Aaron dɛ
column3: Fa w'eduhuamsɛn
column4: na sɔ afɔrmbukyia no do ogya gu mu
column5: na fa eduhuam to do
column6: na suo mu nantsew ntsɛmara kɔ mboanofo no nkyɛn
column7: na kɛpata ma hɔn: na ebufuhyew efi EWURADZE hɔ efir; ɔyardɔm no ahyɛ ase."

column2: "Na Aaron fae dɛ mbrɛ Moses kae no
column3: na otuu mbirika kɔr bagua no finimfin; na
column4: hwɛ
column5: ɔyardɔm no ahyɛ ase wɔ ɔman no mu: na ɔdze eduhuam no gui

column2: "Na ogyinaa ewufo nye enyikamfo no ntamu; na wosiankaa ɔyardɔm no."
"Afei hɔn a wowuwui wɔ ɔyardɔm no mu wɔyɛ mpemduanan nye ahaesuon
column3: ɔsor hɔn a Kora asɛm no ntsi wowuwui no."

column2: "Na ɔyardɔm no siankaa no
column3: Aaron sanee baa Moses nkyɛn wɔ ehyiadzibuw no n'abowano."
